health_checks.details: Main page (index.html) loads correctly. Embedded YouTube video player is functional.

top_3_issues.description: Outdated and Vulnerable jQuery Version (v1.8.1) with known XSS vulnerabilities.
Potential DOM-based Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in ajax-page-loader.js due to insecure injection of HTML content.
Excessive inline CSS and JavaScript in index.html, leading to poor maintainability and performance.

test_status.details: One test case for the video player iframe exists and passes. Test coverage is extremely low.
